contents:
所以边境是谁封的？我们要不要赌赌看他能不能连任

1. 封边不是为了抗疫，封边完后一个多月啥都没干；2. 连任悬念不大，对手太弱；3. 3月初It's just the flu, bro.这锅甩不掉。
----------------------------------------------------------------
So last year 37,000 Americans died from the common Flu. It averages between 27,000 and 70,000 per year. Nothing is shut down, life & the economy go on. At this moment there are 546 confirmed cases of CoronaVirus, with 22 deaths. Think about that! - 9 Mar 2020
